pages.text: The monsters of the night have learned quite a lot of new skills! The $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/improved-mobs)Improved Mobs$() mod included in the modpack makes the existing mobs smarter and it gives them a ton of new abilities. Zombies can now break blocks, doors and can jump to hit you. Creepers can teleport and skeletons can melee you while shooting.

In addition to that the difficulty of the game will increase over time. The longer you play the more difficult the mobs will become. $(imp)This will keep you on your toes when you realize how little time you have >:).$()
